mapper.select: SELECT OTT_NO, OTT_NAME, OTT_THUMB, OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER, PLAN_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PLAN_PRICE,'999,999') AS PLAN_PRICE_OUTPUT, TO_CHAR((PLAN_PRICE / OTT_MAX_MEMBER),'999,999') AS PLAN_EACH_PRICE, PLAN_NAME, OTT_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY OTT_NAME ORDER BY PLAN_PRICE DESC ) AS RNUM, OTT_INFO.* FROM OTT_INFO) WHERE RNUM=1 ORDER BY OTT_NO
SELECT OTT_NO, OTT_NAME, OTT_THUMB, OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER, PLAN_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PLAN_PRICE,'999,999') AS PLAN_PRICE_OUTPUT, PLAN_NAME, OTT_STATUS FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NAME = #{ottName}
SELECT PLAN_NAME, OTT_NO FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NO=#{ottNo}
SELECT PLAN_NAME, OTT_NO, OTT_THUMB, PLAN_PRICE FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NO=#{modal_ott_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY( P_NO, M_NO, OTT_NO, P_SHARE_ID, P_SHARE_PWD, P_MAX_MEMBER, P_START_DATE, P_PERIOD, P_COMMENT, P_END_DATE, P_ACCOUNTS, P_ENTRY_PRICE ) VALUES( SEQ_PARTY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{m_no}, #{ott_no}, #{p_share_id}, #{p_share_pwd}, #{p_max_member}, #{p_start_date}, #{p_period}, #{p_comment}, #{p_end_date}, #{p_accounts}, #{p_entry_price} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.P_NO, P.OTT_NO, P.P_SHARE_ID, P.P_SHARE_PWD, P.P_MAX_MEMBER, P.P_CUR_MEMBER, P.P_START_DATE, P.P_PERIOD, P.P_END_DATE, P.P_COMMENT, P.P_ENTRY_PRICE, TO_CHAR(P.P_ENTRY_PRICE,'999,999') AS P_ENTRY_PRICE_OUTPUT, TO_CHAR(P.P_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_END_DATE_OUTPUT, (TO_DATE(P.P_END_DATE) - TO_DATE(SYSDATE)) AS P_PERIOD_DAY, P.P_STATUS, O.OTT_NAME, O.OTT_THUMB, O.PLAN_NAME, O.PLAN_PRICE FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(P.OTT_NO = O.OTT_NO) WHERE O.OTT_NAME=#{ottName} AND P.P_CUR_MEMBER != P.P_MAX_MEMBER ORDER BY P.P_NO

SELECT P.P_NO, P.OTT_NO, P.P_SHARE_ID, P.P_SHARE_PWD, P.P_MAX_MEMBER, P.P_CUR_MEMBER, P.P_START_DATE, P.P_PERIOD, P.P_END_DATE, P.P_COMMENT, P.P_ENTRY_PRICE, P.P_STATUS, P.P_ACCOUNTS, P.M_NO, TO_CHAR(P.P_ENTRY_PRICE,'999,999') AS P_ENTRY_PRICE_OUTPUT, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(P.P_END_DATE,SYSDATE)) AS ACCOUNTS_COUNT, TO_CHAR(((P.P_ENTRY_PRICE * 0.1) * MONTHS_BETWEEN(P.P_END_DATE,SYSDATE)) ,'999,999') AS P_DEPOSIT, O.OTT_NAME, O.OTT_THUMB, O.PLAN_NAME, O.PLAN_PRICE FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(P.OTT_NO = O.OTT_NO) WHERE P.P_NO=#{no}
SELECT MAX(P_NO) FROM PARTY WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTY WHERE P_NO=#{p_no} AND P_MAX_MEMBER != P_CUR_MEMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY SET P_CUR_MEMBER=#{p_cur_member} WHERE P_NO=#{p_no}
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_POINT=M_POINT+#{point} WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, PO_NO, PO_DATE, PO_STATUS, PO_POINT, M_NO FROM ( SELECT * FROM POINT ORDER BY PO_NO ) WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}

SELECT MP.P_NO, MP.M_NO, MP.STATUS, O.OTT_THUMB, O.PLAN_NAME FROM MEMBER_PARTY MP JOIN PARTY P ON(MP.P_NO = P.P_NO) JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(P.OTT_NO = O.OTT_NO) WHERE MP.M_NO=#{m_no} ORDER BY MP.STATUS DESC
SELECT M.M_ID, MP.M_NO, MP.START_DATE FROM MEMBER_PARTY MP JOIN MEMBER M ON(MP.M_NO = M.M_NO) WHERE MP.P_NO=#{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY( PAY_NO, M_NO, PAY_DATE, AMOUNT )VALUES( SEQ_PAY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{m_no}, #{date}, #{amount} )
